entry.string: Queries in the following functions could be quite expensive for large sites. Even if you don't use page or module output caching, you might consider using query caching to save the results of individual database queries here.
entry.translation: Qooereees in zee fullooeeng fooncshuns cuoold be-a qooeete-a ixpenseefe-a fur lerge-a seetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Ifee iff yuoo dun't use-a pege-a oor mudoole-a ooootpoot cecheeng, yuoo meeght cunseeder useeng qooery cecheeng tu sefe-a zee resoolts ooff indeefidooel detebese-a qooereees here-a.

entry.string: Please note that cached query results will only be invalidated based on expiration time (for now ?).
entry.translation: Pleese-a nute-a thet ceched qooery resoolts veell oonly be-a infeleedeted besed oon ixpureshun teeme-a (fur noo ?).
